definition[0]: (1941–)  a British television presenter and former antiquesdealer who presents the BBC television show Bargain Hunt. He is famous for using the phrases ‘cheap as chips’ (=very cheap), ‘a real Bobby Dazzler’ (=something very good), and ‘a bit of a duffer’ (=something not very good). He likes to wear pinstripe suits and bright ties, and is known for always having a deep tan.
